job.title: Cloud Software Engineer
job.description: pClickHouse has arrived we are the company behind the popular opensource highperformance columnar OLAP database management system for realtime analyticsnbspClickHouse worksnbsp1001000x faster than traditional approachesnbspBy offering a true columnbased DBMS it allows for systems to generate reports from petabytes of raw data with subsecond latenciesnbspWith top adopters such as Uber Cisco and eBay  not only do our products work at lightning speed so do weppbrppClickHouse is searchingnbspfor individuals who are not just knowledgeable about what they do but want to learn more Our ideal candidates are thinkers and doers who are not afraid to take on various roles and responsibilities as they grow with the company If you are looking for a place to build something new be an agent of change and have an opportunity to have a significant impact on the companys success this is the place for youppbrppIn this role you will be working on developing a cloud service around the ClickHouse database Additionally you will collaborate with the SRE and security teams to ensure all SLAs and relevant compliances are met This individual will also help to improve the robustness of ClickHouse cloud service by contributing to tests coverage and QA infrastructureppbrppbrppstrongRequirementsstrongpulliBS MS or PhD in Computer Science or equivalent practical experienceliliProfessional software development experience in Go CC Java or similarliliExperience developing cloud infrastructure services preferably with KubernetesliulpbrppstrongPreferred QualificationsstrongpulliExperience in security privacy and complianceliliExperience with Linux and container environmentsliliExperience with TCPIP and network programmingliliPrevious contributions to open source projectsliulpbrppbrppstrongPerksstrongpulliFlexible work environmentliliComprehensive Health BenefitsliliEquityliliPaid HolidaysliulpLIRemoteppbrppbrppClickHouse Incnbspis an Equal Opportunity Employer We respect and seek to empower each individual and support the diverse cultures perspectives skills and experiences within our workforcenbspWe celebrate diversity and do not discriminate based on race religion color national origin sex sexual orientation age veteran status disability status or any other applicable characteristics protected by lawp
